      Subclasses of NetworkPlayer in it.polimi.LM39.server 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SocketPlayer
      every player connected to the socket has this object which manipulates connection between server and client this is the server side, so we send objects and strings and receive strings from client
      Methods in it.polimi.LM39.server with parameters of type NetworkPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Room.addPlayer(NetworkPlayer player)
      add the player to the current room
      void ServerInterface.joinRoom(NetworkPlayer networkPlayer) 
      void Server.joinRoom(NetworkPlayer networkPlayer)
      this method create the room if needed and call the method to add the player to the room the ROOM_LOCK avoid multiple room creation from different thread
      java.lang.Boolean ServerInterface.loginPlayer(java.lang.String nickName, java.lang.String password, NetworkPlayer networkPlayer) 
      java.lang.Boolean Server.loginPlayer(java.lang.String nickName, java.lang.String password, NetworkPlayer networkPlayer)
      login the player add the player to the room add the player to the server's hashmap register the player to the credentials' database checks if the player was already in a game or if the player is already playing
